mapper.select: select c.id as commentId, c.friend_circle_id as friendCircleId, c.belong_user_id as belongUserId, u.id as commentUserId, u.nickname as commentUserNickname, u.face as commentUserFace, c.father_id as fatherId, c.comment_content as commentContent, fu.nickname as replyedUserNickname, c.created_time as createdTime from `comment` as c left join users as u on u.id = c.comment_user_id left join `comment` fc on fc.id = c.father_id left join users as fu on fu.id = fc.comment_user_id where c.friend_circle_id = #{paramMap.friendCircleId} order by c.created_time asc
